description: This file defines the NotesController class within a ASP.NET Core Web API project, handling CRUD operations for 'notes' with user authorization, utilizing various injected services and models.

classes.name: NotesController
classes.description: API controller providing endpoints for managing notes, including listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting notes for authenticated users.

methods.name: GetUserId
methods.description: Retrieves the current authenticated user's GUID from the claims.

methods.name: List
methods.description: Retrieves a paginated list of notes for the authenticated user.

methods.name: Get
methods.description: Fetches a single note by its GUID for the authenticated user.

methods.name: Create
methods.description: Creates a new note for the authenticated user based on the provided request data.

methods.name: Update
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by GUID for the authenticated user.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Deletes a specified note by GUID for the authenticated user.
